original_text: They were a wall unto us both by night and day, all the while we were with them keeping the sheep.
korean_text: 우리가 양을 지키는 동안에 그들이 우리와 함께 있어 밤낮 우리에게 담이 되었음이라

sentences.original_text: They were a wall unto us
all the while we were with them
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 그들과 함께 있는 동안 내내
